name: The Spectrals
startIntroPart1: "Whoa! What is this place? Err, let me look up
startIntroPart2: A and Lester's guideline to handle this situation..."
__startIntroPart2: Oh no, unhappy people. Umm, let me help you..."
__declaringWar: I'm very very sorry. But my people keep complaining about your 'apparent' existence. I hope its for the best!
declaringWar: I'm sorry, but your apparent existence makes me feel very upset. Prepare for war!
_declaringWar: I'm sorry but, I have to remove you from this plane of existence. Sorry again!
attacked: My creator might made me a peaceful ghost. But that doesn't mean I won't defend my nation!
__attacked: You think my kindness is not good enough? Fine, I'll fight in your betrayal!
_attacked: D-do you think I'm not kind enough? Why, why?!
defeated: I just hope you can keep my people happy better than me...
_defeated: M-maybe I should've trained myself better for this, h-hehe
introduction: Hiya! My name is Purplus, I hope we'll be friends!
tradeRequest: This trade proposal should be beneficial for both of us!
_tradeRequest: Hehehe, this trade should be beneficial for both of us!
uniques: Gain [10] Influence with a [Military] gift to a City-State
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory

[+20]% [Production] [in all non-occupied cities] <during a Golden Age>
[+20]% [Culture] [in all non-occupied cities] <during a Golden Age>
Gain [10] Influence with a [Phantom] gift to a City-State

_civilopediaText.text: A ghost who's assigned to guard the gates to Desion Land. Bue due to lack of visitors, she decided to took an offer to be a leader, somehow!

name: The Silks
startIntroPart1: "Huh, I haven't woke up yet? I hope Stella doing just fine,
startIntroPart2: while I'll probably going out to experience a realistic lucid dream right now."
declaringWar: Are you scared of spiders? How about big ones? Well, I want to know!
_declaringWar: I hereby apologize, but you're in our way! Prepare yourselves!
attacked: Silk's empire are happy with your declaration of war, been looking forward to it!
_attacked: What a surprise! Well, I'm looking forward for this great fight!
_defeated: Hahaha! You fought this war very well! I, Pita, leader of The Silks, officially concedes.
defeated: "You're doing great.", say that to my dear Stella, if you met her, please.
introduction: My name's Pita, the Silks leader. I hope you're fine with me as a spider.
tradeRequest: I hope this nets profits for both of us.
to_op_uniques: [+1 Production] from [Bonus resource] tiles [in all cities connected to capital]
_uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities connected to capital]

name: The Pollens
hateHello: There are no free honey for you!
startIntroPart1: "Wh-what!? A-am I dreaming?! Maybe with this,
startIntroPart2: I can have a lot of friends, while having Pita and Stella with me~"
_declaringWar: I-I'm sorry, b-but your presence distrupts our e-ecosystem. P-please die!
declaringWar: My instincts, I can't believe it, but now, I just want to erase you from existence!
_attacked: A-are you kidding? L-let me tell you, y-you won't win this!
attacked: Are you kidding me? Let me tell you, you won't win this!
_defeated: H-hehehehe, h-hehehehe, h-hehehehehehe! Y-you f-fought so well! I-I give up!
defeated: Pita, Stella and Catherine, I've failed. I've failed! I've failed!
introduction: Hehe, my name is Hanny! Here, have some honey, those are free!
tradeRequest: This trade includes a free honey, because I'm charitable!
_tradeRequest: C'mon, this is a beneficial trade, trust me!
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Forest] tiles without [Lumber mill] [in all cities]
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [15]
__uniques: [+1 Gold] from [Bonus resource] tiles [in all cities connected to capital]
[+1 Gold] from [Strategic resource] tiles [in all cities connected to capital]
_uniques: [+1 Food] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Desion
declaringWar: That empire of yours, I just want to see them... destroyed, that's all.
_declaringWar: You're so annoying... we must... get rid of you!
attacked: War is always what I wanted from the beginning. Thanks for making it easier for me, heheh.
_attacked: Hmm, we see... you're interested in war. Well, I hope... it goes well for all of us...
__attacked: Oh my gosh, all of the sudden, you make everything interesting!
defeated: Hahahaha! You made me feel so happy! Congrats, my burden of living, finally be gone!
_defeated: Alas, I've fallen... I hope my empire... is in better state... in your hands...
introduction: My name is A, leader of Desion empire. I take no kindly to enemies, but I certain, you understand what I mean.
_introduction: Hello there... my namecode is A... I don't reveal my name to strangers...
tradeRequest: Do you think this is fair?
_tradeRequest: What do you think... about our offer?
uniques: Receive free [Great Artist] when you discover [Philosophy]

name: The Beakers
startIntroPart2: Regardless, research of new circumstances required!"
declaringWar: You pest, we angry. Must exterminate!
defeated: I'm disappointed. We hope, you'll do good.
_defeated: You conqueror. I'm amazed. Take care.
introduction: Name's Chrome, The Beakers' leader. Apologize, dislikes chatter.
uniques: Gain a free [Lighthouse] [in all coastal cities]

name: The Knights
startIntroPart1: "Gah, I've woken up to another ridiculous civilization universe again.
startIntroPart2: Time to make the most out of it!"
declaringWar: From a mile away, Sid wanted to continue his conquest on earth further. Well, that's the beginning of the story!
_declaringWar: It is unfortunate of how profitable it is due to many bounties placed on you. Sorry, but you must die!
attacked: My knights are ready, my sword is ready. What are you waiting for?
_attacked: My next target attacks me, huh? Well, this will surely become an interesting match!
defeated: Alas, The Knights has fallen. You're a better warrior than I am. I am honored.
_defeated: You're so good at this, I feel honored to be defeated.
introduction: My name is Sid. Mighty knight pen with a sword. I hope we'll become good rival!
_introduction: My name is Sid of the Knights. We're running knight errands daily, join while you can!
tradeRequest: Take this offer, it'll be worthwhile for both of us.

name: Drake
startIntroPart2: This world will be mine, A, you'll know it!"
declaringWar: I dreamt of fire and ashes covering towns you own. Thankfully, I'm the one who's gonna start it!
_declaringWar: Heheheheh, your pitiful army won't stand up against mine. Prepare to die!
attacked: Foolish, foolish! Do you think you have what it takes on Drake? I don't believe you!
defeated: Urgh, you, you! Gaaah, I surrender! You should be the dragon, not me!
introduction: My name is Hatred! Be aware of your manners, otherwise I will strike you, hahah!
tradeRequest: Accept this proposal if you want to be safe.

name: The Rotors
startIntroPart2: Now plan to conduct experiments with these hopeful subjects!"
_declaringWar: There are some theories that I needed to test if they're right or wrong. Well, you're a good test subject, I apologize for that.
__declaringWar: Apologize, I've tracked your 'bad' decisions and its proven to be beneficial for declaring war on you right now. I hope you're prepared.
declaringWar: Pardon, I have no excuse for war, except for your territory and field experiments I have to conduct. Anyhow, good luck!
attacked: Thanks, this makes my job much more easier.
_attacked: War declaration? I wonder how's this gonna turn out in the end.
_defeated: If I have hands, I would salute you, great conqueror!
defeated: If I have hands, I would salute you, great conqueror!
introduction: My name is Lester. I once was a scientist of Desion. Why am I here? Whoops, that one is personal.
__introduction: My name is Lester. Be careful around me, okay. I can be a bit violent with my job, despite myself not wanting it.
_introduction: My name is Lester. It is an interesting pleasure to meet you.
tradeRequest: I've carefully calculated this offer to be beneficial for both of us.
uniques: "Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game

name: The Cottons
hateHello: I'm waiting the winds to start...
startIntroPart1: "Aaaa! I've blown away by the wind too much!
startIntroPart2: Now I have no lead these people to greater civilization!"
declaringWar: Winds has been blown in your empire's direction. So did my army, I want to attack your nation full force!
_declaringWar: Bad winds have been storming around your nation, the only way to prevent it... is to attack you!
_attacked: Aww, you just have to attack me, wouldn't you?
attacked: With the power of the winds, you will be unlucky facing The Cottons!
defeated: Wind, wind, wind. Why are you betraying me like this...
introduction: Hi hi hi! My name is Catherine! I hope wind of fortune blows in your way as well!
tradeRequest: Accept this deal while it's worthwhile!
uniques: [+1] Movement <for [Civilian] units> <while the empire is happy> <when not at war>
[+1] Movement <for [Military] units> <while the empire is happy> <when at war>

name: The Maws

pita_interaction.neutralHello: What can I do for you, spider?
pita_interaction.declaringWar: I'm very very sorry, spider. But your treachery leaves me no choice...
pita_interaction.attacked: I'm going to cry, but that doesn't mean I won't defend myself...
pita_interaction.defeated: At least with this, I can stay on your side from now on, spider!

hateHello: There's no way you're the spider.
startIntroPart2: But for the spider, I'll do anything!"
denounce: I suspect your malicious intentions. I'll make you pay!
afterPeace: I hope the spider would approve of this peace treaty...
declaringWar: Do you see my army of archers? It would be suck if they all aiming towards you, doesn't it? Hehe!
_declaringWar: For the sake of the spider, I hereby declare war on you!
attacked: Are you for sure that's a wise choice? The spider will be proud of my hunts!
_attacked: You just have to get in the way, aren't you? Well, good luck!
defeated: Even in my defeat, I will search for you, my spider!
introduction: You're not the spider aren't you? Sorry, I can't tell.
tradeRequest: I can hear the spider tells me, this is a worthwhile trade.
_tradeRequest: I believe this trade will be worthwhile, please accept it.
_uniques: [+33]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities] <during a Golden Age>

name: D'Latte
hateHello: I don't want to see you...
startIntroPart2: Whatever, as long I get to serve people coffee, I'm happy!"
_declaringWar: I've been feeling this energized after drinking this coffee. The next thing I want, is to attack you!
declaringWar: Even after my eleventh coffee, I can't stop my own thought to declare war on you. Gah, prepare yourselves!
attacked: We're here just for peace, but if you're going to attack, we'll defend!
_defeated: Maybe I shouldn't serve so much coffee, heh~
defeated: Maybe, I shouldn't so fed up by drinking too much coffee. Ouch.
introduction: Greetings, Amanda of D'Latte accepts your presence with pleasure!
_tradeRequest: This trade includes a free coffee. Hmm~
uniques: [+10] HP when healing <within [2] tiles of a [Coffee Joint]>
